name: Planet Clicker
description:
Welcome to Planet Clicker!

Click the planet to earn taps.
Use taps to buy new planets.
Get ore by clicking the planet.
Use ore to buy new pics.
Use picks to get more taps and ore.
Enjoy!

Art done by JellyJake112;
Programming done by JellyJake112;
Sound done by JellyJake112;
Music done by unknown...
